data.title: Joan Bennett Service Details - Belleville, Ontario
data.meta_description: Bennett (nee Durkin), Joan Margaret – peacefully and quietly after a long illness, at Hospice Quinte, Belleville, on Thursday, November 17th, 2022, in her 73rd year. Daughter of the late William and Mary Ann Durkin. Beloved wife of Douglas Bennett. Dear sister of Edward (Jayne Doran) Durkin, of Read, Patricia (Tom) Dowling, of Napanee, and Ross (Lori Fobert) Durkin, of Belleville.  She is predeceased by her sisters, Catharine Durkin, Ann-Marie LaBerge (Clarence), and her brother Owen Durkin.  Joan is loved by her many nieces and nephews. Joan’s family extends grateful thanks to the staff at QHC Belleville General Hospital and to Stan Klemencic Care Centre, (Hospice Quinte), for their Kindness and Compassion. Cremation has taken place.  The Funeral Mass will be celebrated at St. Charles Borromeo Church, Read, on Thursday, November 24, 2022 at 11:00 a.m., with inurnment to follow in the St. Charles Cemetery.  Arrangements entrusted to Steele Funeral Home, Moira Street Chapel, (613-968-2273).   If desired, Memorial Donations to St. Charles Borromeo Church http://www.holynameofmary3.com or Hospice Quinte http://hospicequinte.ca would be appreciated.
